body: She's supposed to be smart but gives him the device not expecting him to immediately try it on her? That said this is the best part by far, the rest of the story is downright terrible
Almost 7 months later... Idk I just felt like coming back here lol
The beginning looks like a shojo.

Best girl by far in part 1. Also if you get handed a mind control device (that you aren't sure works) by an insanely hot short stack who's lowkey making fun of you through the entire conversation, and you're already feeling bitter, you're gonna dick her down. Especially in a hentai.
People really do be complaining about the MC being "ungrateful" in a mind control doujin.
Let's say the chairman didn't reject him the whole story would've never happened 😂

Okay, first issue. While the art and sex are good, I have a problem with the main character. He went to the dark side way too quickly. He's not likeable. After reading the 8th issue first I can see this guy is not redeemable so the story will probably end with a violent comeuppance.
Actually, you know what? No it’s not hot. Fuck this dude. “Forced to” my ass she did you a favor. Rot in hell shitbag. Remember kids, nothing is hotter than consent.
He did her wrong... He should have treated her with more care, since she gave him the device ://
